product_name: Moving Comfort Serendipity Tank Top - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Yoga really stretches your limits, but the Moving Comfort Serendipity Tank Top keeps you covered and comfortable no matter how far you go. Soft, lightweight fabric wicks away moisture to keep you dry. Fabric is also naturally soft and breathable; internal shelf bra provides light support; removable molded cups add shaping. Multiple straps offer support and style; adjustable over-the-shoulder straps ensure a perfect fit. Moving Comfort Serendipity Tank Top features a drawcord at hem so you stay covered even while attempting a headstand. Closeout.
short_description: Yoga really stretches your limits, but the Moving Comfort Serendipity Tank Top keeps you covered and comfortable no matter how far you go. Soft, lightweight fabric wicks away moisture to keep you dry.
